abstract: The Asia-focused bank based in London plans to exit its equity derivatives and convertible bonds businesses, the latest move in its turnaround efforts.
snippet: The Asia-focused bank based in London plans to exit its equity derivatives and convertible bonds businesses, the latest move in its turnaround efforts.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Standard Chartered, the Asia-focused bank based in London, said on Monday that it planned to exit its equity derivatives and convertible bonds units as its new chief executive, William T. Winters, reshapes the company.

headline.main: Standard Chartered to Wind Down 2 More Businesses in Overhaul

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
